text: napiye! Nir umatu manaivikalukkum, umatu makalkalukkum, nampikkaiyalarkalin penkalukkum, avarkal tankal talai muntanaikalai (tankal mukankalil pottu) irakkik kollumpati nir kuruviraka. Atanal, avarkal kanniyamanavarkal ena ariyappattu, evarutaiya tunpattirkum avarkal ullakatiruppatarku ituculapamana valiyakum. Allah mikka mannippavanaka, maka karunaiyalanaka irukkiran
